resources.string:
"Hi, I'm a wee dog! 
I love fish. 
The kind that is alive and swims around in a river or an aquarium, or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 
I wish I had some aquariums and a river!. 
I love eating fish too! Unless it is mixed with dog meat! :-( 
I would love to try and catch fish! 
I would like to do a lot of things actually, especially if it involves biting people! 
I love waking people up but only when I decide! 
I know things! 
 I eat things! 
 Oh aye, and if you've got something, I want it!"
